name: part_001
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2023】3Dバラエティ！あびゃびゃ！全国おいしい発見！～高級食材で牛丼づくりに挑む～【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [Si2W-gcT1Lw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Musical performance of 'Oniku Japonesque!' featuring Hololive members.
MC segment where the host, Amane Kanata, and the guests introduce themselves and discuss the event's premise.

subtitles.original: オーイ！
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: にくにくしい...
subtitles.english: So meaty...

subtitles.original: あなたは なぜか今日は ふしぎ顔
subtitles.english: For some reason, you have a strange look on your face today.

subtitles.original: きっと あれかしら
subtitles.english: I wonder if it's that.

subtitles.original: たんぱく質が足りないのね
subtitles.english: You're lacking protein, aren't you?

subtitles.original: ミートとユーとの ジョーシーなおにく
subtitles.english: Juicy meat between Meat and You.

subtitles.original: ユーとミートの げんきなえいえいよう！
subtitles.english: Energetic nutrition between You and Meat!

subtitles.original: ミートとユーとの ジョーシーなおにく
subtitles.english: Juicy meat between Meat and You.

subtitles.original: ユーとミートの ハッピーなおにく
subtitles.english: Happy meat between You and Meat.

subtitles.original: だいすき！
subtitles.english: I love it!

subtitles.original: 国産のおにく 国産のおにく
subtitles.english: Domestic meat, domestic meat.

subtitles.original: にっくにく じゃぱねすく
subtitles.english: Niku Niku Japonesque.

subtitles.original: だいすきよー
subtitles.english: I love you...

subtitles.original: あなたとひとつになれるのならば
subtitles.english: ...if I can become one with you.

subtitles.original: こんな幸せはないわー
subtitles.english: ...there is no greater happiness than this.

subtitles.original: お味はいかが？
subtitles.english: How does it taste?

subtitles.original: 黒毛和牛上塩タン焼 680円
subtitles.english: Kuroge Wagyu Premium Salted Tongue Roast 680 Yen

subtitles.original: ずーっと会いたくて待ってたの
subtitles.english: I've been waiting to meet you all this time.

subtitles.original: 網の上に優しく寝かせて
subtitles.english: Gently lay me down on the grill.

subtitles.original: あなたにほてらされてあたしは色が変わるくらい
subtitles.english: Heated by you until my color changes.

subtitles.original: キラキラ光る粒の飾りで
subtitles.english: Adorned with sparkling grains...

subtitles.original: オシャレ
subtitles.english: ...so stylish.

subtitles.original: だいすきよー
subtitles.english: I love you...

subtitles.original: もっともっと あたしを愛して
subtitles.english: ...love me more and more.

subtitles.original: だいすきよー
subtitles.english: I love you...

subtitles.original: あなたとひとつになれるのならば
subtitles.english: ...if I can become one with you.

subtitles.original: こんな幸せはないわ
subtitles.english: There is no greater happiness than this.

subtitles.original: お味はいかが？
subtitles.english: How does it taste?

subtitles.original: ということで、やってきました！白銀ノエル生誕祭2023！
subtitles.english: And so, here we are! Shirogane Noel's Birthday Celebration 2023!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Yay! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: ありがとうー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、改めて司会を務めさせていただきます。鼻声の天音かなたです。イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yes, so once again, I'll be serving as your MC. I'm Amane Kanata, with a stuffy nose. Yay!

subtitles.original: 大丈夫？ / 鼻声ですが、大丈夫です
subtitles.english: Are you okay? / She has a stuffy nose, but she's fine.

subtitles.original: そして、本日の主役のー！
subtitles.english: And today's guest of honor...!

subtitles.original: わーい！どうも主役です、誕生日です！ホロライブ3期生の白銀ノエルです！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay! I'm the star, it's my birthday! I'm Shirogane Noel of Hololive's 3rd Generation! Yay!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Yay! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: そして、お馴染みの豪華ゲストの皆さんでございます。はい！
subtitles.english: And here are our familiar and wonderful guests. Go ahead!

subtitles.original: こんふぁーれ！豪華ゲストのひとり、ホロライブ3期生の不知火フレアです！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Kon-Flare! One of the special guests, Shiranui Flare from Hololive 3rd Gen! Yay!

subtitles.original: 自分で言っちゃったｗ
subtitles.english: She said it herself lol.

subtitles.original: こんぺこー！豪華ゲストのひとり、兎田ぺこらっぺこー！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Kon-Peko! One of the special guests, Usada Pekora-peko! Yay!

subtitles.original: Ahoy! 同じく豪華ゲストのひとり、宝鐘マリンです。イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Ahoy! Likewise, one of the special guests, Houshou Marine here. Yay!

subtitles.original: 今日は、団長が誕生日祝いに牛丼を振る舞ってくれるという話で皆さん呼ばれていたと思うんですけど...
subtitles.english: Today, everyone was invited here on the premise that Danchou would be treating us to beef bowls to celebrate her birthday...

subtitles.original: ま、なぜか、関係のない僕が司会を務めさせてもらっております。
subtitles.english: But for some reason, I, who have nothing to do with it, am serving as the MC.

subtitles.original: えー！だってやっぱり司会と言ったらかなたんっしょ！っていうね！
subtitles.english: Ehh! But when it comes to MCing, it's gotta be Kanatan! Right?

subtitles.original: あら、ありがとう！赤身コンビですからね！
subtitles.english: Oh, thank you! We are the lean meat duo, after all!

subtitles.original: ま、ちょっと今日は鼻声だけど…あと皆さん、ちょっと気づきませんか？なんか、クイズ番組っぽい…
subtitles.english: Well, I have a stuffy nose today... but also, don't you all notice? It feels kind of like a quiz show...

subtitles.original: 確かに、何だ、不穏だなこれ。
subtitles.english: True, what is this? This feels ominous.

subtitles.original: 牛丼食べるだけって感じじゃないよね。
subtitles.english: It doesn't feel like we're just here to eat beef bowls.

subtitles.original: いやでもこれ、あれですよ、牛丼を置く机ね、これ。
subtitles.english: No, but look, this is just a table to put the beef bowl on.

subtitles.original: ああ、食卓ねｗ
subtitles.english: Ah, a dining table lol.

subtitles.original: 何が始まるんです？
subtitles.english: What's about to start?

subtitles.original: いやー、まあまあ、ちょっと皆さんとりあえず落ち着いてもらっていいっすか？
subtitles.english: Whoa, whoa, could everyone just calm down for a second?

subtitles.original: えーっと、今日はね、団長と一緒にね、誕生日だからわーって食べてもらう感じだったんですけども...
subtitles.english: Um, today was supposed to be a thing where you all just eat excitedly with me since it's my birthday, but...

subtitles.original: なんかちょっと準備が楽しすぎて…ということで団長、急遽…
subtitles.english: Well, the preparations were just too much fun, so I...
